params.name: documentId
params.description: The document id of the node to preview

params.name: modalIcon
params.description: (Optional) The icon to show at the top of the modal. This should be one of the [Fontawesome (v4.7.0)](https://fontawesome.com/v4.7.0/icons/) icons. Do not include the fa- prefix, just use the icon names as-is from the documentation.

params.name: modalTitle
params.description: (Optional) The title being shown at the top of the modal. Defaults to `t__Select a link`.

params.name: nodeId
params.description: The node which should be highlighted.
